comments.body: It would be nice to add a comment here like "see KIP-480 for details" so that people would know where to look to find more information.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@ * <li>If a partition is specified in the record, use it
 * <li>If no partition is specified but a key is present choose a partition based on a hash of the key
 * <li>If no partition or key is present choose the sticky partition that changes when the batch is full.
 * 
 * See KIP-480 for details about sticky partitioning.
